pages.title: In Minecraft
pages.text: A birch is a tree that appears similar to a common oak in terms of height and leaves, but with light bark and pale wood. A taller, rare tree can be found in old growth birch forests.

pages.title: On Earth
pages.text: A birch is a thin-leaved hardwood tree of the genus Betula in the family Betulaceae, which also includes alders, hazels, and hornbeams. They are typically short-lived pioneer species and are widespread in the Northern Hemisphere, particularly in northern areas of temperate climates and in boreal climates.
